text:
What types of conditions are patients using medical #cannabis for?
🌱 Chronic #pain, insomnia, #depression & anxiety
🌱 Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD)
🌱 Crohn's disease
🌱 Multiple sclerosis (MS), seizures, glaucoma
🌱  symptoms & side effects of #cancer and HIV treatment https://t.co/e9H7t4PaRU
